answers.answer: Just depends on the person and pregnancy. I'm due in 8 days and I'm a FTM.
Yep, it just depends on the person. I was 3 days past my due date with my first.
I had my first at 35weeks but i never went into labor. Had him by emergency c section due to severe preeclampsia.
Actually, I think first time moms go past their due date more often than other moms. Each pregnancy is different. 37 weeks on is technically full term I read. :)
I'm ftm n due tomorrow(40weeks) n still pregnant
Most first time moms go over their due date.

I had my son on my due date but only because I had a emergency c-section. All my friends have gone over their due dates and needed to be induced 6 out of 8 times none have had their babies early so It all depends on the woman and baby.
When I had my first child she came 3 days late.
Most ftms go over their due date... i went 5 days late witg my first... usually they get quicker wach time but your more likely to go late than early first time round :) xxx
I went 2 weeks over my due date with my first...

question: Everyone ive asked have told me that with their first child, the baby was birn up to 3weeks early. For first time moms does this occur alot, or.does it just depend. Im a ftm &ijust want to know if ill make it a full 9months or deliver earlier then expected. Want my daughter in my arms already♥
title: ftm
